headline: Donald Trump to Newsmax: ‘Remember, Nancy Pelosi Is in Charge of Security’ on Jan. 6
author: NationalWatch
sentences:
Donald Trump to Newsmax: 'Remember, Nancy Pelosi Is in Charge of Security' on Jan. 6 (Newsmax/YouTube)
By Eric Mack | Saturday, 09 April 2022 09:00 PM
While Democrats continue the investigations of Donald Trump and the Jan. 6 "witch hunt," the former president hailed the "exoneration" of a Jan. 6 defendant this week and pointed at the real culprit of the storming of the Capitol: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi.

As widely reported, and oft-repeated by Trump, Pelosi turned down the pre-Jan. 6 presidential request of 10,000 National Guard troops to provide security for the Capitol on the date of the congressional hearings to certifying Joe Biden's Electoral College votes.

The Jan. 6 defendant was found innocent in his trial because his lawyers successfully defended him being in the Capitol because security was letting people in.
"Remember this: Nancy Pelosi is in charge of security," Trump told Newsmax's John Bachman in an exclusive back-stage interview Saturday.
Trump also made an exclusive backstage announcement of an official endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate primary.
Trump also spoke about the two exonerations and two hung juries in the trials of alleged masterminds of a kidnapping plot of Gov.

We had a request for 10,000 National Guard or soldiers to be there, and she turned them [down].
